snippet.title: MindsEye - Welcome to Redrock - Official Story Trailer | 2025
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Now: https://go.mindseye.game/preorder
Launching June 10, 2025 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

Welcome to Redrock. A super-heated, near-future metropolis where technology is king.

MindsEye is a story-driven, single-player action-adventure thriller. In our second story trailer we share a glimpse of technology's immersive influence on Redrock, where consumer robots carry out most manual tasks and an algorithm connects all-seeing devices. The city itself is a living experiment in the existential potential of man and machine.

Watch the Story Trailer revealing a closer look at the world of Redrock and some of MindsEye’s intriguing characters.
